=Secure SHell=

SSH 打通：
{{{
ssh-keygen -t rsa

cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
}}}

SSH代理：
{{{
ssh -f -N <user name>@<ip or domain> -D <port>
}}}

`ssh -i`
{{{
ssh -i id_rsa  // private key, the pub key >> authorized_keys [id_rsa的机器需要和目标机打通]
}}}
